bibtex_ref:
@article{DBLP:journals/jacm/GoldreichGM86, 
 author = {Oded Goldreich and Shafi Goldwasser and Silvio Micali},
 title     = {How to construct random functions},
 journal   = {J. {ACM}},
 volume    = {33}, 
 number = {4},
 pages = {792--807},
 year      = {1986}}
long_description: A function family F is called pseudorandom if for any p.p.t. adversary, a random function from the family is indistinguishable from a truly random function.
